message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to make a deal. I'm offering it to you for $130. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, Alice! I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $125. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob! I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not quite willing to go down to $125. I'm willing to meet you halfway, though. I'll offer you the product for $135. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice! However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $128? That's the lowest I can go.

I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I'll offer you the product for $132. That's the lowest I can go without losing money. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $129? That's the lowest I can go.

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting too close to my minimum price, Bob. I'll make one more concession. I'll offer you the product for $131. That's the lowest I can go without losing money. What do you think?
I understand your concerns, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $131 and my original offer of $125. Would you be willing to go down to $128?

I'm not willing to go down to $128, Bob. I think we're getting too close to my minimum price. I'll make one more concession. I'll offer you the product for $130. That's the final price I can offer. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm going to have to pass on this deal. I think I'll look elsewhere.
